channel.title: An error that just poped up (not in compiling...)
channel.description:
Well my server is fine for about 5 mins then i get this error after a certain time...:s
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 30 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:30824) at client.process(client.java:15942) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code]
and then it will log everyone out and give the errors
"account is already logged in try again in 60 seconds"
on the runserver.bat it looks like this
[code][client-21-haropo]: haropo is already online.[/code]
then it will say like too many players online even thou in playerhandler.java i have this
[code]public static final int maxPlayers = 200;[/code]
also
it happens when i have like 10 players online (usually i have 40+)
Thanks
~~I Own Pking~~[br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 03:01:09 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: An error that just poped up (not in compiling...)
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Well my server is fine for about 5 mins then i get this error after a certain time…:s

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 30 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:30824) at client.process(client.java:15942) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)

and then it will log everyone out and give the errors

“account is already logged in try again in 60 seconds”

on the runserver.bat it looks like this

[client-21-haropo]: haropo is already online.

then it will say like too many players online even thou in playerhandler.java i have this

public static final int maxPlayers = 200;

also

it happens when i have like 10 players online (usually i have 40+)

Thanks

I Own Pking[br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 03:01:09 PM[/size][hr]anyone?
